name: Avocado Oat Shake
description: This Avocado Oat Shake is a perfect blend for those seeking a healthy yet delicious drink. It's crafted with low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar ingredients, making it an ideal choice for anyone looking to indulge in a guilt-free treat. Dive into the healthified world with this nutrient-packed recipe that promises to refresh and revitalize your day.

recipeInstructions.text: Mash or puree the avocado until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine the mashed avocado, water, oat milk, and Stevia sachet.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Blend on high speed for 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and creamy.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the shake into a glass and enjoy immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4
